name: github-analyser
description: build the client and moves the folder to dist

scripts.install: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.buildBackend: cd backend && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist && npm install && npm run build && mv ./dist ../ && cp -R ./package*.json ../dist && cd ../dist && npm install --only=prod && rm ./*.json && cd ..
scripts.buildFrontend: cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf build && npm install && npm run build && cp -R ./build/. ../dist/web && cd ../dist/web/static/js
scripts.buildDocker: npm run clean && npm run buildBackend && npm run buildFrontend && docker build -t ssm/github-analyser .
scripts.start: cd backend && npm start && cd ../frontend && npm start
